summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1454, for the improvement of the alley between 24th Avenue and 25th Avenue, from East Pine Street to East Howell Street, by grading the same under Ordinance No. 15623 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
